channel.title: Removing objects, adding new coords to items
channel.description:
Right here's the dilemma, I want to make it so the Exit cave found when you create a new account teleport to you a different area other than Edge, a long with that I want to move a few items and remove some. But that's the problem I've check through 10 guides or more, I can't find a fix nor figure this out with my own logic.
Now bare in mind I'm a new coder but I've grasped this quite well, before anyone asks, I'm not stealing this source, I felt the need to host it due to it being released.
I've checked the ObjectHandler, ObjectManager, and whatever else the Tutorials have said to use.
Thanks in advance

item.title: Removing objects, adding new coords to items
item.dc:creator: @collide collide
item.description:
@collide wrote:

I have, I just can’t seem to find it I can’t find the GlobalObject in my Client.Java

Read full topic

Ohh try client.java, or in my server I have a class to handle each packet because It’s neater.

Check in your client.java, or objecthandler.java or something.

item.title: Removing objects, adding new coords to items
item.dc:creator: @collide collide
item.description:
@collide wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:4, topic:378639”][quote author=collide link=topic=474503.msg3469696#msg3469696 date=1295203865]
Ok basically, you know how you add/delete items in ObjectManager. Well I got the side of my problem fixed. Now the problem I got now is, when a person creates a new account he spawns in a cave, he/she then moves onto the Exit, and is teleported somewhere. I want to know how to change those Coords. I can’t find a tut anywhere and my own Logic is failing due to the lack of sleep.
[/quote]

Search the Coords that you spawn in Player.java then change them. :|[/quote]

Nope, thats not what I’m asking for. xD, The spawn is where it needs to be. It’s for when you leave the cave, I need to find the file to change those coords

Read full topic
